SEARCH

Package display.appointment

package display.appointment
This package contains the classes that are used to display the appointment related information.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AppointmentDisplay
    This class provides various methods for managing and displaying appointment-related information for doctors and patients.
    AppointmentOutcomeDisplay
    This class is responsible for displaying the appointment outcome records for a patient
    CalendarDisplay
    The CalendarDisplay class provides a method for displaying a calendar view for a specified month and year in a console-friendly format.
